mapper.select: select e_no as eNo e_name as eName, s_no as sNo, s_name as sName, examCard from (examiners left join exam on examiners.e_id=exam.e_id) left join stu on examiners.s_id=stu.s_id

select e_no as eNo e_name as eName, s_no as sNo, s_name as sName, examCard from (examiners left join exam on examiners.e_id=exam.e_id) left join stu on examiners.s_id=stu.s_id where e_no=#{examiners} or e_name like #{examiners}
mapper.insert: insert into examiners ( s_id as sId, e_id as eId, examCard ) values ( #{sId}, #{eId}, #{examCard} )
